Then they flip it, and it's Jordano's turn to pound away at Jordan's meaty ass, before both Jordano and Marc cum all over an exasperated, sweaty Jordan. He's covered in cum, but given the cost of home repairs these days, it's totally worth it.
series: Marc Williams, Jordano Santoro & Jordan Deep
title: Contract Work
